c2.name: Vitality Burst
c2.effect: Decreases the CD of Let the Show Beginğ…  by 15%. During the ability's duration, your active character gains 15% Hydro DMG Bonus.

c3.name: Star of Tomorrow
c3.effect: Increases the level of Shining Miracleğ…  by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Attentiveness be My Power
c4.effect: Every enemy Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her. A maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

c5.name: The Purest Companionship
c5.effect: Increases the level of Let the Show Beginğ…  by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Dedicating Everything to You
c6.effect:
When Barbara is not on the field, and one of your characters in the party falls:
- Automatically revives this character.
- Fully regenerates this character's HP to 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.
